author: milos88
content:
I'm starting to contribute to Portal Network and working with <@425615769280315392> . 

We are wondering about the state of the https://github.com/crate-crypto/rust-verkle. It says it's not ready to be used for non-research purpose and it seams like there isn't any development happening (last commit 8 months ago).

Can I work on it and make it production ready (or closer to that)? Who would be the best contact person?
